master.adventureDescription:
3-day surf camp in Nicaragua

Experience the best craft breweries in the Pacific Northwest. Portland is often referred to as Beervana, and itâ€™s easy to understand why once you get a sip of their delicious ales.  This adventure will provide insider access to spectacular local breweries that define the taste and experience of Oregon beer culture and tradition.
master.adventureGearList:
What to Bring

  • First and foremost, bring your thirst!  (Both for beer and for knowledge about the history and craft of beermaking)
  • Depending on the time of year, it may get chilly and/or wet so dress accordingly.
  • Camera to capture great memories
master.adventureItinerary:
We will start with the education first and introduce you to the ingredients in beer and how they've contributed to the rise of craft beer in the Pacific Northwest. We'll walk you through the tasting process so you can better enjoy beers and explore new styles.

On our next stop you'll get VIP access behind the scenes to see the brewing process and how the ingredients work together to produce the liquid love.

By the 3rd stop, you'll be ready for some eats! Food paired with beer is the best way to enjoy a few bites. This will be a chill location where you can connect with your new beer friends, play some beer trivia with a chance to win a prize, while sipping on some of the city's finest suds.
